meanings.sent1: During the camping trip, we set up our tentages in the forest.

meanings.definition: The act of setting up tents.

meanings.sent2: The scout troop practiced their tentages assembly skills in the field.
meanings.sent3: The sudden rainstorm made the tentages setup a challenging task.

meanings.definition: The materials used in making tents.
meanings.sent1: The outdoor store offered a variety of tentages for sale, including different fabrics.
meanings.sent2: The quality of the tentages depended on the durability of the materials used.
